job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement testing tools and frameworks to automate test processes.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on Software Development & Integration (1.A.1) and Operations & MLOps (1.A.2) tasks related to testing, CI/CD, and quality assurance. There are no tasks or mentions of AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or generative AI specific concepts. Therefore, the role is classified as a Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the responsibilities, which are all related to SDET/QA engineering. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML tasks, making the classification straightforward and highly confident.
